title: The Adventures of Kid Combat Volume Two: The Heist of Spring Road Toys
description: Kid Combat is back! Taking place directly after the events of Volume I, The Heist of Spring Road Toys continues the Kid Combat adventure. It has been a busy few weeks for Kid and his closest friends. As work completes on their secret base The Playground Kid Combat looks into the Spring Road Toys case and finds out he has a new enemy...
author: Christopher Helwink
